channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump directs troops to Portland with "full force" directive
item.description: President Trump authorized military troops in Portland, Oregon, on Saturday, giving them authority to use "full force." The big picture: After sending...

item.title: Jobs crisis in plain sight
item.description: Starting with our interview last spring with Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei, where he foresaw a white-collar bloodbath, we've been warning of a jobs crisi...

item.title: Trump's epic economic and drug figures fizzle under scrutiny
item.description: President Trump and his administration frequently boast that he's "been right about everything" and that his policies have ushered in the " Golden Age...

item.title: Colombian president accuses Trump of violating UN principles after visa revoked
item.description: Colombian President Gustavo Petro accused President Trump on Saturday of violating "founding principles" of the United Nations after the U.S. State De...

item.title: "The first domino": Comey indictment sets MAGA retribution in motion
item.description: The indictment of former FBI Director James Comey has delivered President Trump and the MAGA movement their first real taste of legal retribution — an...

item.title: Trump officials ask Supreme Court to uphold ban on birthright citizenship
item.description: Most experts say Trump’s effort to do away with birthright citizenship is legally dubious, but the high court has backed the president in other emerge...

item.title: National Weather Service at ‘breaking point’ as storm approaches
item.description: The National Weather Service is struggling to maintain its forecasting operations due to significant staffing cuts under the Trump administration.

item.title: Hegseth says soldiers from Wounded Knee will keep Medals of Honor
item.description: The previous defense secretary, Lloyd Austin, had asked the Pentagon to review 20 medals that were given to soldiers from the massacre.

item.title: Government shutdowns high on drama, but low on long-term political impact
item.description: As Washington stumbles toward another government shutdown, some veterans of previous battles caution against reading too much into the political tea l...

item.title: Trump calls for troops in Portland, escalating use of military inside U.S.
item.description: President Donald Trump authorized the use of troops in Portland, Oregon, in a campaign to use the U.S. military against Americans that has little mode...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
